channel.title: Purbanchal Directory - Recently Added Listings - Departmental Store

item.title: Gorkha Department Store
item.description: More than 1 lakh 50 thousands household goods available at fixed price.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Super Mini Mart
item.description: A complete departmental store situated at the heart of Indrapur (Khorsane), Morang, Nepal. Saving your time is our motto, that's why we have every house hold items stored for you. Come and get goods ranging from kitchen items such as knife, rice cooker, gas,etc to junk foods such as chips, biscuits.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Sajilo Bazar :: Kanchanbari
item.description: We are located at the Heart of Kanchanbari, Biratnagar. We are a one stop solution for shoppers looking for groceries to house hold appliances. Sajilo Bazar has become a brand name at Kanchanbari. Opening Time : 8 am Closing Time : 8 pm
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Nepal Bazar International Pvt. Ltd.
item.description: Nepal Bazar International Pvt. Ltd. Dear Customers, We are organizing a World Cup Quiz right from today. Our aim is to get you involved in supporting World Cup 2014. Participants needs to give correct answers via comments. Winner will be randomly picked and will get opportunity to win exciting gift vouchers. Winner will be announced via FACEBOOK and www.purbanchaldirectory.com
item.dc:creator: superadmin
